TopicTitle: Had a crazy night...so this happened

Articles.Content:
Yeah...foolish, a lot of laughs and no science. But from craziness starts my new ideas. I decided to try to document them. I at least laughed at myself!

My challenge was to build a spaceplane with rockets and fly it. Thor rockets...they are not very spaceplane friendly...
Maybe if you used the thrust limiter, it would not fly apart hilariously... That can be a good thing or a bad thing depending on your perspective. Thanks for the funny vid!
